amendment.description: An amendment to add text to the end of the resolution to make an additional amendment in order.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 84 - 325 (Roll no. 199).

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 188 (Roll no. 198).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. DeSaulnier.
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 84 - 325 (Roll no. 199).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeSaulnier amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 84 - 325 (Roll no. 199).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
